pixl.name: noimg
pixl.text: This image has been deleted, fear the copytrolls.

pixl.name: mario
pixl.text: Already converted countless times into cakes cookies and legos, now you too can memorize the correct combination of pixls to crotchet your own.

pixl.name: ace
pixl.text: The elaborate ace of spades was once used as proof that the pack was genuine and tax had been paid.

pixl.name: joystick
pixl.text: Before joypads had 20 buttons there where joysticks with one button. The kempston competition pro is a pure icon of 80s gaming.

pixl.name: miner
pixl.text: Before monty there was manic and 2049er, this one is manic.

pixl.name: e
pixl.text: This is an easy E, play fast to win.

pixl.name: rgb_cube
pixl.text: An isometric cube made of red green and blue.

pixl.name: melon_dezign
pixl.text: A really butchered melon dezign logo, sorry but it is hard to fit it into 16x16.

pixl.name: qbert
pixl.text: This ugly guy is Q*bert and he likes to swear.

pixl.name: mochi
pixl.text: To build tools and services that support passionate content creators so that they can focus on what they love most: CREATIVITY.
